alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 3:26AM EST until March 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, greatest across higher elevations. * WHERE...In eastern New York, Dutchess and eastern Ulster Counties. In northwest Connecticut, Litchfield County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel due to slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may begin as a brief period of rain before quickly changing to snow this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
